category: Member sport organization regulations/Article 25 (Term of office of officers)
contents: Article 25 (Term of office of executives) ① The term of office of directors, including the chairman and vice-chairman, shall be four years, and the term of office of auditors shall be two years, but may be reappointed only once. However, accounting audit does not limit the number of consecutive terms. Revised March 23, 2017, July 29, 2020. ② The term of office is not based on the number of days, but is based on the regular general meeting at which the officers were elected, and the calculation of the term of office for officers other than auditors is as follows. Revised 2019. 11. 7., 2022. 12. 26. 1. Starts from the date of the first regular general meeting after being elected as president. However, if elected in a by-election, the term of office begins from the date of approval by the Sports Council. 2. The vice president and directors start from the date of the general meeting when they are appointed. However, if the appointment authority is delegated to the chairman pursuant to Article 22 (1), the term of office begins on the date of appointment by the chairman. ③ The term of office of an officer elected by a by-election shall be the remaining period of the predecessor's term, and the term of office of an officer appointed as the number of officers has increased shall be the remaining period of the other officer. Revised 2019. 11. 7., 2021. 10. 6. ④ Notwithstanding paragraph 3, the term of office of a chairman elected in a by-election for a chairman with less than one year remaining in term of office shall be deemed to be four years added to the remaining term. , In this case, notwithstanding Article 25-2 (3), the person is deemed to have been reappointed once. Newly established on July 29, 2020. ⑤ Notwithstanding paragraph 2, in the case of a management organization, the term of office of the chairman is based on the date the management organization was dissolved. Newly established 2021. 10. 6.
